question_text: A user upgrades from a 20-pin to a 24-pin ATX motherboard. What is the MOST likely result if they use their old PSU?
answer_options: System will refuse to POST without warning
It may work with limited stability or features
The PSU will short circuit instantly
correct_answer: It may work with limited stability or features
explanation: Some motherboards can operate with a 20-pin PSU in a 24-pin socket, but this may result in reduced stability or insufficient power.
